backend.authentication: JWT with OAuth for Google Sign-In

system_diagram.code:
flowchart TD
    ClientApps[Client Apps - Mobile]
    APIGateway[API Gateway]
    AuthService[Auth Service]
    UserService[User Service]
    CalendarService[Calendar Service]
    TaskService[Task Service]
    RewardService[Reward Service]
    NotificationService[Notification Service]
    SyncService[Sync Service]
    PaymentService[Payment Service]
    PrimaryDB[(PostgreSQL Database)]
    Cache[(Redis Cache)]
    CloudStorage[(AWS S3 for Avatars)]
    GoogleAPI[Google API]
    PaymentGateway[Payment Gateway]

    ClientApps --> APIGateway
    APIGateway --> AuthService
    APIGateway --> UserService
    APIGateway --> CalendarService
    APIGateway --> TaskService
    APIGateway --> RewardService
    APIGateway --> NotificationService
    APIGateway --> SyncService
    APIGateway --> PaymentService

    AuthService --> PrimaryDB
    AuthService --> Cache
    AuthService --> GoogleAPI

    UserService --> PrimaryDB
    UserService --> Cache
    UserService --> CloudStorage

    CalendarService --> PrimaryDB
    CalendarService --> Cache
    CalendarService --> SyncService

    TaskService --> PrimaryDB
    TaskService --> Cache
    TaskService --> NotificationService

    RewardService --> PrimaryDB
    RewardService --> Cache
    RewardService --> NotificationService

    NotificationService --> ClientApps

    SyncService --> PrimaryDB
    SyncService --> GoogleAPI

    PaymentService --> PaymentGateway
    PaymentService --> PrimaryDB
    PaymentService --> UserService

backend_diagram.code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph Input[INPUT LAYER]
        MobileApp[Mobile App Requests]
        WebHooks[Google Calendar Webhooks]
        PaymentWebhooks[Payment Webhooks]
    end

    subgraph API[API GATEWAY]
        ExpressServer[Express.js Server]
        AuthEndpoint[POST /api/v1/auth/login]
        UserEndpoint[GET /api/v1/users/me]
        EventEndpoint[POST /api/v1/events]
        TaskEndpoint[POST /api/v1/tasks]
        RewardEndpoint[POST /api/v1/rewards/redeem]
        SyncEndpoint[POST /api/v1/sync/google]
    end

    subgraph Processing[PROCESSING ENGINE]
        AuthSvc[Auth Service]
        UserSvc[User Service]
        CalendarSvc[Calendar Service]
        TaskSvc[Task Service]
        RewardSvc[Reward Service]
        NotifSvc[Notification Service]
        SyncSvc[Sync Service]
        PaymentSvc[Payment Service]
    end

    subgraph External[EXTERNAL SERVICES]
        GoogleAPI[Google Calendar API]
        PaymentGW[Payment Gateway]
        SocketIO[Socket.IO Server]
    end

    subgraph Storage[STORAGE LAYER]
        PostgreSQL[(PostgreSQL RDS)]
        RedisCache[(Redis Cache)]
        S3Storage[(AWS S3)]
    end

    subgraph Output[OUTPUT LAYER]
        JSONResponse[JSON API Response]
        RealtimeNotif[Real-time Notifications]
        SyncStatus[Sync Status]
    end

    MobileApp --> ExpressServer
    WebHooks --> ExpressServer
    PaymentWebhooks --> ExpressServer

    ExpressServer --> AuthEndpoint
    ExpressServer --> UserEndpoint
    ExpressServer --> EventEndpoint
    ExpressServer --> TaskEndpoint
    ExpressServer --> RewardEndpoint
    ExpressServer --> SyncEndpoint

    AuthEndpoint --> AuthSvc
    UserEndpoint --> UserSvc
    EventEndpoint --> CalendarSvc
    TaskEndpoint --> TaskSvc
    RewardEndpoint --> RewardSvc
    SyncEndpoint --> SyncSvc

    AuthSvc --> PostgreSQL
    AuthSvc --> RedisCache
    AuthSvc --> GoogleAPI

    UserSvc --> PostgreSQL
    UserSvc --> RedisCache
    UserSvc --> S3Storage

    CalendarSvc --> PostgreSQL
    CalendarSvc --> SyncSvc

    TaskSvc --> PostgreSQL
    TaskSvc --> NotifSvc

    RewardSvc --> PostgreSQL
    RewardSvc --> NotifSvc

    SyncSvc --> PostgreSQL
    SyncSvc --> GoogleAPI

    PaymentSvc --> PaymentGW
    PaymentSvc --> PostgreSQL

    NotifSvc --> SocketIO

    PostgreSQL --> JSONResponse
    RedisCache --> JSONResponse
    S3Storage --> JSONResponse
    SocketIO --> RealtimeNotif
    SyncSvc --> SyncStatus

frontend_diagram.code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph User[USER LAYER]
        Parent[Parent User]
        Child[Child User]
        Guest[Guest User]
    end

    subgraph UI[MOBILE APPLICATION]
        LoginScreen[Login Screen]
        HomeScreen[Home Dashboard]
        CalendarView[Calendar View]
        TaskList[Task List]
        RewardStore[Reward Store]
        ProfileView[Profile View]
        NotifCenter[Notification Center]
    end

    subgraph Components[REACT NATIVE COMPONENTS]
        AuthComp[Auth Components]
        CalendarComp[Calendar Components]
        TaskComp[Task Components]
        RewardComp[Reward Components]
        ProfileComp[Profile Components]
        NotifComp[Notification Components]
    end

    subgraph State[STATE MANAGEMENT]
        ReduxStore[Redux Store]
        AuthSlice[Auth Slice]
        UserSlice[User Slice]
        EventSlice[Event Slice]
        TaskSlice[Task Slice]
        RewardSlice[Reward Slice]
        NotifSlice[Notification Slice]
    end

    subgraph API_Layer[API COMMUNICATION]
        AuthAPI[Auth API Client]
        UserAPI[User API Client]
        EventAPI[Event API Client]
        TaskAPI[Task API Client]
        RewardAPI[Reward API Client]
        SyncAPI[Sync API Client]
        WebSocket[WebSocket Client]
    end

    subgraph Backend[BACKEND SERVICES]
        ExpressAPI[Express.js API]
        SocketServer[Socket.IO Server]
    end

    subgraph Data[DATA PERSISTENCE]
        AsyncStorage[AsyncStorage]
        SecureStore[Secure Store]
    end

    Parent --> LoginScreen
    Child --> LoginScreen
    Guest --> LoginScreen

    LoginScreen --> HomeScreen
    HomeScreen --> CalendarView
    HomeScreen --> TaskList
    HomeScreen --> RewardStore
    HomeScreen --> ProfileView
    HomeScreen --> NotifCenter

    CalendarView --> CalendarComp
    TaskList --> TaskComp
    RewardStore --> RewardComp
    ProfileView --> ProfileComp
    NotifCenter --> NotifComp
    LoginScreen --> AuthComp

    AuthComp --> ReduxStore
    CalendarComp --> ReduxStore
    TaskComp --> ReduxStore
    RewardComp --> ReduxStore
    ProfileComp --> ReduxStore
    NotifComp --> ReduxStore

    ReduxStore --> AuthSlice
    ReduxStore --> UserSlice
    ReduxStore --> EventSlice
    ReduxStore --> TaskSlice
    ReduxStore --> RewardSlice
    ReduxStore --> NotifSlice

    AuthSlice --> AuthAPI
    UserSlice --> UserAPI
    EventSlice --> EventAPI
    TaskSlice --> TaskAPI
    RewardSlice --> RewardAPI
    EventSlice --> SyncAPI
    NotifSlice --> WebSocket

    AuthAPI --> ExpressAPI
    UserAPI --> ExpressAPI
    EventAPI --> ExpressAPI
    TaskAPI --> ExpressAPI
    RewardAPI --> ExpressAPI
    SyncAPI --> ExpressAPI
    WebSocket --> SocketServer

    AuthSlice --> SecureStore
    UserSlice --> AsyncStorage

sequence_diagram.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant APIGateway
    participant AuthService
    participant PrimaryDB
    participant Cache

    Client->>+APIGateway: POST /auth/login
    APIGateway->>+AuthService: Login Request
    AuthService->>+PrimaryDB: Find User by Email
    PrimaryDB-->>-AuthService: User Record
    AuthService->>+Cache: Store Session Token
    Cache-->>-AuthService: Success
    AuthService-->>-APIGateway: JWT Token
    APIGateway-->>-Client: Login Success Response
